channel.title: Download Manager and BM Source
channel.description:
Hi
How do I use a program like Free Download Manager to download BM Source? I have a data cap on my internet connection and I need to watch what i download. I cannot afford to have downloads of this size disrupted. I do not want anything to do with torrents.
Thanks.
